title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
simple_desc: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.
stars: ['Shameik Moore', 'Hailee Steinfeld', 'Brian Tyree Henry', 'Luna Lauren Velez']

title: The Dark Knight
simple_desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
simple_desc: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Inception
simple_desc: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
simple_desc: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
simple_desc: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: The Matrix
simple_desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
simple_desc: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: Soorarai Pottru
simple_desc: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
simple_desc: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
simple_desc: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her 10-year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Seven Samurai
simple_desc: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

title: Harakiri
simple_desc: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: Léon: The Professional
simple_desc: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

title: Gladiator
simple_desc: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
simple_desc: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
simple_desc: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Avengers: Endgame
simple_desc: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
simple_desc: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: Oldboy
simple_desc: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
simple_desc: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

title: Aliens
simple_desc: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

title: Kaithi
simple_desc: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

title: Asuran
simple_desc: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

title: Black Friday
simple_desc: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

title: Thani Oruvan
simple_desc: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
simple_desc: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

title: Heat
simple_desc: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: North by Northwest
simple_desc: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.
stars: ['Cary Grant', 'Eva Marie Saint', 'James Mason', 'Jessie Royce Landis']

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
simple_desc: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

title: Princess Mononoke
simple_desc: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Kantara
simple_desc: When greed paves the way for betrayal, scheming and murder, a young tribal reluctantly dons the traditions of his ancestors to seek justice.

title: Dangal
simple_desc: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Raatchasan
simple_desc: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
simple_desc: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

title: Shershaah
simple_desc: Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

title: Maanaadu
simple_desc: On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, his bodyguard and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
simple_desc: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
simple_desc: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: Jurassic Park
simple_desc: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
simple_desc: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

title: Batman Begins
simple_desc: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
simple_desc: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

title: Die Hard
simple_desc: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: V for Vendetta
simple_desc: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

title: Warrior
simple_desc: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

title: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
simple_desc: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: Ran
simple_desc: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
simple_desc: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Vikram Vedha
simple_desc: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

title: Yojimbo
simple_desc: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
simple_desc: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
simple_desc: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
simple_desc: In the 1970s, a gangster goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine.

title: Rangasthalam 1985
simple_desc: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

title: Sherlock Jr.
simple_desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
simple_desc: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
simple_desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper and a drifter named Max.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
simple_desc: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Blade Runner
simple_desc: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: Ford v Ferrari
simple_desc: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: The Terminator
simple_desc: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: Logan
simple_desc: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
simple_desc: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: Rush
simple_desc: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
simple_desc: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

title: The Iron Giant
simple_desc: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
simple_desc: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

title: The General
simple_desc: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
simple_desc: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

title: Sholay
simple_desc: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

title: The Hidden Fortress
simple_desc: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

title: White Heat
simple_desc: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: A Wednesday
simple_desc: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

title: Sarfarosh
simple_desc: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

title: Safety Last!
simple_desc: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

title: Omkara
simple_desc: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.
stars: ['Ajay Devgn', 'Kareena Kapoor', 'Saif Ali Khan', 'Konkona Sen Sharma']

title: Hera Pheri
simple_desc: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: Thuppakki
simple_desc: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

title: Kaththi
simple_desc: A case of mistaken identity embroils an escaped convict in a fight against a large corporation intent on seizing a village's land.
stars: ['Joseph Vijay', 'Samantha Ruth Prabhu', 'Neil Nitin Mukesh', 'Tota Roy Chowdhury']

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
simple_desc: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
simple_desc: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Dune
simple_desc: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

title: Blade Runner 2049
simple_desc: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Deadpool
simple_desc: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: The Avengers
simple_desc: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
simple_desc: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

title: The Incredibles
simple_desc: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.
stars: ['Craig T. Nelson', 'Samuel L. Jackson', 'Holly Hunter', 'Jason Lee']

title: Casino Royale
simple_desc: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

title: The Revenant
simple_desc: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Akira
simple_desc: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
simple_desc: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
simple_desc: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

title: Ip Man
simple_desc: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

title: Infernal Affairs
simple_desc: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
stars: ['Andy Lau', 'Tony Leung Chiu-wai', 'Anthony Chau-Sang Wong', 'Eric Tsang']

title: Wolfwalkers
simple_desc: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
simple_desc: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

title: Elite Squad
simple_desc: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.

title: Sanjuro
simple_desc: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen trying to save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

title: Haider
simple_desc: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

title: Elite Squad 2: The Enemy Within
simple_desc: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.

title: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
simple_desc: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
simple_desc: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

title: Arjun Reddy
simple_desc: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

title: 1: Nenokkadine
simple_desc: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

title: Avatar
simple_desc: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Iron Man
simple_desc: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
simple_desc: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: Star Trek
simple_desc: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
simple_desc: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

title: The Bourne Identity
simple_desc: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
simple_desc: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

title: Children of Men
simple_desc: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have somehow become infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

title: The Blues Brothers
simple_desc: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

title: District 9
simple_desc: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
simple_desc: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: A Fistful of Dollars
simple_desc: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: Ghost in the Shell
simple_desc: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: The Raid 2
simple_desc: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

title: Hero
simple_desc: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

title: The Wild Bunch
simple_desc: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

title: Letters from Iwo Jima
simple_desc: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

title: A Taxi Driver
simple_desc: A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting his decision after being caught in the violence around him.

title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
simple_desc: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

title: Baby
simple_desc: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

title: Airlift
simple_desc: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

title: Vishwaroopam
simple_desc: When a classical dancer's suspecting wife sets an investigator behind him, a series of violent events are triggered, revealing his real identity and connection to a darker world.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
simple_desc: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
stars: ['Michelle Yeoh', 'Stephanie Hsu', 'Jamie Lee Curtis', 'Ke Huy Quan']

title: The Batman
simple_desc: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: The Gentlemen
simple_desc: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
simple_desc: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

title: RRR
simple_desc: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.
stars: ['N.T. Rama Rao Jr.', 'Ram Charan', 'Ajay Devgn', 'Alia Bhatt']

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
simple_desc: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

title: Drive
simple_desc: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver.

title: Dunkirk
simple_desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

title: Apocalypto
simple_desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
simple_desc: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

title: Ghostbusters
simple_desc: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

title: Captain America: Civil War
simple_desc: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

title: Predator
simple_desc: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: Skyfall
simple_desc: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

title: Hot Fuzz
simple_desc: A skilled London police officer, after irritating superiors with his embarrassing effectiveness, is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, as a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

title: Taken
simple_desc: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
simple_desc: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

title: The Fugitive
simple_desc: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Captain Phillips
simple_desc: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

title: The Last Samurai
simple_desc: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

title: Big Hero 6
simple_desc: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: I Saw the Devil
simple_desc: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

title: Serenity
simple_desc: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

title: The Fighter
simple_desc: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

title: Thirteen Lives
simple_desc: A rescue mission is assembled in Thailand where a group of young boys and their soccer coach are trapped in a system of underground caves that are flooding.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
simple_desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0
simple_desc: Yuta Okkotsu, a high schooler who gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.

title: The Chaser
simple_desc: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

title: Ninja Scroll
simple_desc: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
simple_desc: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
directors: ['Eric Radomski', 'Kevin Altieri', 'Boyd Kirkland', 'Frank Paur', 'Dan Riba', 'Bruce Timm']

title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
simple_desc: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
simple_desc: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

title: The Killer
simple_desc: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

title: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
simple_desc: Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.
stars: ['Til Schweiger', 'Jan Josef Liefers', 'Thierry van Werveke', 'Moritz Bleibtreu']

title: Minnal Murali
simple_desc: An unusual event creates a lightning which in turns gives superhuman abilies to an ambitious tailor ,whose responsibility is now to protect his home village from the evil plans of the antagonist.

title: Lakshya
simple_desc: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
simple_desc: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
simple_desc: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

title: Black Hawk Down
simple_desc: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
simple_desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: The Dirty Dozen
simple_desc: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
simple_desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
simple_desc: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: The Lego Movie
simple_desc: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

title: Star Trek Into Darkness
simple_desc: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
simple_desc: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Training Day
simple_desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Man on Fire
simple_desc: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: X: First Class
simple_desc: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

title: The Longest Day
simple_desc: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.
directors: ['Ken Annakin', 'Andrew Marton', 'Gerd Oswald', 'Bernhard Wicki', 'Darryl F. Zanuck']

title: The Bourne Supremacy
simple_desc: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: The Magnificent Seven
simple_desc: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

title: First Blood
simple_desc: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
simple_desc: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

title: The Boondock Saints
simple_desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.
stars: ['Willem Dafoe', 'Sean Patrick Flanery', 'Norman Reedus', 'David Della Rocco']

title: Dirty Harry
simple_desc: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

title: Goldfinger
simple_desc: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
simple_desc: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
simple_desc: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

title: The French Connection
simple_desc: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

title: Run Lola Run
simple_desc: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: The Man from Nowhere
simple_desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

title: Kubo and the Two Strings
simple_desc: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

title: Badlands
simple_desc: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

title: Ponniyin Selvan: Part I
simple_desc: Vandiyathevan sets out to cross the Chola land to deliver a message from the Crown Prince Aditha Karikalan. Kundavai attempts to establish political peace as vassals and petty chieftains plot against the throne. Unrest grips the land as a long-tailed comet arrives, signalling a time of turmoil.

title: Key Largo
simple_desc: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

title: Scarface
simple_desc: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: Hard Boiled
simple_desc: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

title: Joint Security Area
simple_desc: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
simple_desc: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

title: Eega
simple_desc: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.

title: Udta Punjab
simple_desc: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

title: Raazi
simple_desc: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

title: Magadheera
simple_desc: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
simple_desc: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.

title: Deadpool 2
simple_desc: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

title: The Fifth Element
simple_desc: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

title: Sicario
simple_desc: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
simple_desc: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
simple_desc: Three years into the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, while Anakin is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister plot to rule the galaxy.

title: Baby Driver
simple_desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

title: Watchmen
simple_desc: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

title: Incredibles 2
simple_desc: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

title: Where Eagles Dare
simple_desc: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

title: RoboCop
simple_desc: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

title: Train to Busan
simple_desc: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

title: Zombieland
simple_desc: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.

title: Kung Fu Panda
simple_desc: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

title: Creed
simple_desc: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

title: The Road Warrior
simple_desc: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

title: Kick-Ass
simple_desc: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.
stars: ['Aaron Taylor-Johnson', 'Nicolas Cage', 'Chloë Grace Moretz', 'Garrett M. Brown']

title: Falling Down
simple_desc: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

title: Minority Report
simple_desc: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

title: Sherlock Holmes
simple_desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

title: Lethal Weapon
simple_desc: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
simple_desc: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

title: Battle Royale
simple_desc: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
simple_desc: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

title: The Raid: Redemption
simple_desc: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

title: End of Watch
simple_desc: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

title: Enter the Dragon
simple_desc: A Shaolin martial artist travels to an island fortress to spy on an opium lord - who is also a former monk from his temple - under the guise of attending a fighting tournament.

title: Die Hard with a Vengeance
simple_desc: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Hotel Mumbai
simple_desc: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

title: Only the Brave
simple_desc: Based on the true story of the Granite Mountain Hotshots, a group of elite firefighters who risk everything to protect a town from a historic wildfire.

title: Escape from Alcatraz
simple_desc: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possibly successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

title: Star Trek: First Contact
simple_desc: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

title: United 93
simple_desc: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on September 11th, 2001 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
simple_desc: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
simple_desc: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.
